info.title: Moosend
info.description: The ultimate email marketing software and marketing automation platform that will not break your bank. With hundreds of up-to-date templates to choose from, your email marketing campaigns will be dressed for success.

get.description: Retrieves a list of your active mailing lists in your account.
Retrieve details for a given mailing list.

post.description: Creates a new empty mailing list in your account.
Updates the properties of an existing mailing list.

delete.description: Deletes a mailing list from your account.

post.description: Creates a new custom field in the specified mailing list.
Updates the properties of an existing custom field in the specified mailing list.

delete.description: Removes a custom field definition from the specified mailing list.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all subscribers in a given mailing list.
Searches for a subscriber with the specified email address in the specified mailing list.
Searches for a subscriber with the specified unique identifier in the specified mailing list.

post.description: Adds a new subscriber to the specified mailing list.

HasExternalDoubleOptIn.description: Whether has external double opt in.
HasExternalDoubleOptIn.title: Has External Double Opt In

HasExternalDoubleOptIn.description: Whether has external double opt in.
HasExternalDoubleOptIn.title: Has External Double Opt In

post.description: Adds multiple subscribers in a mailing list with a single call.

HasExternalDoubleOptIn.description: Whether has external double opt in.
HasExternalDoubleOptIn.title: Has External Double Opt In

post.description: Updates a subscriber in the specified mailing list.
Unsubscribes a subscriber from the account.
Unsubscribes a subscriber from the specified mailing list.
Removes a subscriber from the specified mailing list permanently.
Removes a list of subscribers from the specified mailing list permanently.

get.description: Returns a list of all campaigns in your account with detailed information.
Returns a complete set of properties that describe the requested campaign in detail.
Retrieves a list of your active senders in your account.
Returns information for the specified sender identified by its email address.

post.description: Creates an exact copy of an existing campaign. The new campaign is created as a draft.
Creates a new draft campaign in your account.
Updates properties of an existing draft AB campaign in your account. Non-draft campaigns cannot be updated. Ignore (AB Split Campaign Option) if you want to create a regular campaign.

delete.description: Deletes a campaign from your account, draft or even sent.

post.description: Sends a test email of a draft campaign to a list of email addresses you specify for previewing.
Sends an existing draft campaign to all recipients specified in its mailing list. The campaign is sent immediately.

get.description: Retrieves a detailed list of statistics for a given campaign based on activity such as emails sent, opened, bounced, link clicked, etc.
Retrieves a basic summary of the results for any sent campaign such as the number of recipients, opens, clicks, bounces, unsubscribes, forwards etc. to date.
Returns a detailed report of your campaign opens (unique and total) by country.
Returns a list with your campaign links and how many clicks have been made by your recipients, either unique or total.

post.description: Assigns a scheduled date and time at which the campaign will be delivered.
Removes a previously defined scheduled date and time from a campaign, so that it will be delivered immediately if already queued or when sent.

get.description: Provides a basic summary of the results for a sent AB test campaign, separately for each version (A and B), such as the number of recipients, opens, clicks, bounces, unsubscribes, forwards etc to date.
